name: DateSelector

props.name: onChange
props.description: Fires with ISO value when selection changes.

props.name: endValue
props.description: Controlled end date when `range` is true.

props.name: defaultEndValue
props.description: Default end date for uncontrolled range mode.

props.name: onRangeChange
props.description: Fires with start and end ISO values when range changes.

props.name: compactMode
props.description:
Control how compact mode engages.
- 'auto' (default): measure container and switch at thresholds.
- 'on': force compact layout always.
- 'off': disable compact behavior entirely.

props.name: compactThresholdIn
props.description: Width below which compact turns on (when compactMode='auto'). Default: 340

props.name: compactThresholdOut
props.description: Width above which compact turns off (when compactMode='auto'). Default: 380

props.name: preset
props.description: One or many style-preset names registered via `definePreset()`

bestPractices: Use ISO 'YYYY-MM-DD' strings for values; avoid locale-dependent parsing.
Control the value in app state to persist selection across navigation.
Constrain input with minDate/maxDate to prevent out-of-range selection.
For ranges, keep [start, end] ordered and handle partial selection gracefully.
Avoid timezone pitfalls: treat values as local dates to prevent off-by-one errors.
Prefer compactMode on small viewports; use default/adaptive on larger layouts.
